addons.name: uBlock Origin
addons.description: Finally, an efficient wide-spectrum content blocker. Easy on CPU and memory.
addons.fullDescription:
uBlock Origin is not an "ad blocker", it's a wide-spectrum content blocker with CPU and memory efficiency as a primary feature.

***

Out of the box, these lists of filters are loaded and enforced:

- EasyList (ads)
- Peter Lowe’s Ad server list (ads and tracking)
- EasyPrivacy (tracking)
- Malware domains

More lists are available for you to select if you wish:

- Fanboy’s Enhanced Tracking List
- Dan Pollock’s hosts file
- MVPS HOSTS
- Spam404
- And many others

Additionally, you can point-and-click to block JavaScript locally or globally, create your own global or local rules to override entries from filter lists, and many more advanced features.

***

Free.
Open source with public license (GPLv3)
For users by users.

If ever you really do want to contribute something, think about the people working hard to maintain the filter lists you are using, which were made available to use by all for free.

***

    Documentation
    Release notes
    Community support @ Reddit
    Contributors @ GitHub
    Contributors @ Crowdin

screenshots.caption: The popup panel in Firefox Preview: default mode with more blocking options revealed
The unified logger tells you all that uBO is seeing and doing

addons.name: LastPass Password Manager
addons.description: LastPass, an award-winning password manager, saves your passwords and gives you secure access from every computer and mobile device.
addons.fullDescription:
LastPass puts you in control of your online life – making it easy to keep your critical information safe and secure so you can access it whenever you want, wherever you are. Save all your passwords, addresses, credit cards and more in your secure vault and LastPass will automatically fill in your information when you need it.

Stop wasting time  getting locked out of accounts or filling  passwords and  forms online – LastPass  simplifies your daily online tasks  while keeping you  and your family  secure.  

All your data, where you need it:
- Store usernames and passwords and LastPass will log you in automatically
- Fill forms quickly by saving your addresses, credit card numbers and more
- Save passports, insurance cards and anything else you want to keep safe
- All your data is available on any device for free
- Anything you save on one device is instantly synced on all your other devices

Protect yourself from breaches:
- LastPass Security Dashboard provides and overview of your weak and reused passwords and how to improve them
- LastPass dark web monitoring alerts you if your information is at risk
- Generate secure passwords to replace weak ones
- Protect your LastPass account with multifactor authentication

Simplify your life:
- Never forget another password
- Passwords are autofilled for you as you go to your sites - less typing!
- Securely share your passwords with friends and family
- Only worry about one master password

LastPass Data:
All of your sensitive vault data, including passwords, secure notes, and uploads is protected through comprehensive measures including use of AES 256 encryption with salting and hashing (for more information regarding LastPass' security features, please visit here):
- All your passwords and other saved sensitive items are stored in an encrypted manner that is never visible to LastPass in its unencrypted form.
- This ‘zero-knowledge' model is designed to ensure that the items you save in your LastPass vault may only be decrypted client-side via a Master Password that only the user possesses.
- LastPass may collect certain high-level usage data (i.e., domain-level URLs) in order to provide a better user experience and customer support.

The binary component, if optionally installed, will securely communicate with the extension to enable additional functionality including the handling of attachments and syncing logins across clients locally on your computer.

Personal Data:
LastPass collects and maintains data as necessary to provide, operate, and support our services. We may collect information* which includes but is not limited to:
- Your LastPass account information, which includes account owner, account type, as well as payment and transactional information.
- Your usage, which includes successful and failed log-in attempts, feature utilization, types of items stored in your vault, and sharing of folders.
- User-specific information, which may include your IP address, devices utilized and associated with your account, as well as your name, email address, and phone number.
To the extent that ‘personal data' is shared with third-parties to provide the services to you and on your behalf, such third-parties shall be identified at LogMeIn's Privacy & Trust Center.
*Some additional information may be collected if specific features are enabled and/or depending on your LastPass account tier.

Only you know your master password, and only you can access your vault. Your master password is never shared with LastPass. That’s why millions of people and businesses trust LastPass to keep their information safe. We protect your data at every step.

LastPass is free to download and use on any desktop or laptop computer. LastPass Premium adds more features, like family password sharing, 1 GB of encrypted file storage, Premium two-factor authentication options like YubiKey, and priority tech support. Learn more at https://lastpass.com/go-premium

Learn about more features and get LastPass for Internet Explorer, Firefox, Safari, Chrome, Microsoft Edge and Opera from www.LastPass.com

screenshots.caption: LastPass is an award-winning password manager and form fill for all browsers, platforms, and mobile devices.

addons.name: Enhancer for YouTube™
addons.description: Take control of YouTube and boost your user experience!
addons.fullDescription:
Built to get the most out of YouTube, this extension comes packed with all sorts of features that allow you, among other things, to manage ads as you wish, control the playback speed and the volume level with the mouse wheel, automate repetitive tasks such as selecting the appropriate playback quality, configure dozens of keyboard shortcuts to control YouTube like a pro, and much more...
Give it a try! But be aware that you will never want to use YouTube without it after that ;)

Proudly recommended by Mozilla, this extension does not collect data and respects users' privacy.

YouTube is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.

addons.name: Dark Reader
addons.description: Dark mode for every website. Take care of your eyes, use dark theme for night and daily browsing.
addons.fullDescription:
This eye-care extension enables night mode creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors making them high contrast and easy to read at night.

You can adjust brightness, contrast, sepia filter, dark mode, font settings and ignore-list.

Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't send user's data anywhere. It is fully open-source https://github.com/darkreader/darkreader

Before you install disable similar extensions. Enjoy watching!

addons.name: Youtube Audio
addons.description: Stream just the audio from YouTube to save bandwidth and battery life
addons.fullDescription: Disable video with a single click so you can save bandwidth and battery when you just want audio from YouTube

addons.description: Language pack for Firefox for en-CA

addons.name: Spanish (Mexico) Language Pack
addons.description: The Mozilla Mexican Community publish the Language Pack in Mexican Spanish (es-MX) for Mozilla Firefox.
addons.fullDescription: If you can't see any change on the Firefox interface; open a new Tab and type "about:config" then find the "general.useragent.locale" property and change it's current value for this: "es-MX", restart Firefox and now you must see the Language Pack in action. Enjoy!

addons.name: Spanish (Chile) Language pack
addons.fullDescription:
Paquete de idiomas para Mozilla Firefox en español de Chile (es-CL).

NOTA: Si después de instalar el paquete de idiomas, no ves ningún cambio en la interfaz; abre una pestaña nueva, introduce about:config en la barra de direcciones, pulsa el botón para entrar en la configuración avanzada, una vez ahí, busca la propiedad "general.useragent.locale" da doble clic sobre ella y cambia el valor actual por es-CL, reinicia Firefox y ya deberías ver los cambios.

addons.name: Interface Português/Brasil [pt-BR]
addons.description: Tradução do Firefox para o português brasileiro. Complemente a tradução instalando o corretor ortográfico: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/corretor/
addons.fullDescription:
Usa um Firefox antigo? Clique, no rodapé da página, “Informações da versão”, “Ver o histórico completo de versões”.

Use esta extensão para traduzir o Mozilla Firefox em inglês para o português. É a mesma tradução do Firefox pt-BR.

Use a extensão Locale Switcher para alternar entre os idiomas instalados. Para mais detalhes clique no link da homepage.

addons.name: Czech (CZ) Language Pack

Nezapomeňte také na český slovník pro kontrolu pravopisu.

addons.name: Valencian Catalan Language Pack for Firefox
addons.description: Language pack for having Firefox interface in Valencian Catalan variant.
addons.fullDescription:
This addon enables Firefox interface in Valencian Catalan variant.

Compared to the generic version, Valencian genuine forms are prioritized and own accentuation system is preferred. Recommendations from AVL, the normative entity which regulates Valencian in the Valencian territory according to the Statute of Autonomy, are followed.

The easier way to use it is following the instructions from here (in Valencian).

Alternately, in order to install this, please have Simple Locale Switcher extension enabled before and choose "Catalan (valencia)" in the languages section of the add-on manager.

addons.name: Vietnamese Language Pack
addons.description: The alpha test of the pack, but usable!
addons.fullDescription: [en] You should follow these steps for the extension to work:rn- Type ``about:config'' in the Location box,rn- Locate `general.useragent.locale' item, double-click to edit,rn- In the `Enter string value' dialog, clear then enter ``vi'',rn- Restart Firefox, the extension now working.rnrn[vi]Thực hiện các bước sau để extension có thể hoạt động:rn- Gõ vào hộp `Location:' ``about:config'',rn- Tìm đến mục `general.useragent.locale', nhấp kép chuột để thay đổi giá trị,rn- Trong hộp thoại `Enter string value', xóa trắng sau đó nhập vào ``vi'',rn- Khởi động lại Firefox, giao diện chương trình sẽ được chuyển sang tiếng Việt.

addons.name: Aragonese Language Pack
addons.description:
Paquet d'idioma ta Firefox 28. Si emplegas atra versión de Firefox, mira-te https://addons.mozilla.org/es-ES/firefox/addon/aragonese-language-pack/versions/
Tamién puetz baixar Firefox dreitament en aragonés dende https://www.mozilla.org/an/
addons.fullDescription:
(an)
Paquet d'idioma aragonés ta o Mozilla Firefox 9 u superior.
Punche aquí si precisa de paquetz d'idioma ta versions anteriors de Mozilla Firefox. Manimenos, se consella baixar dreitament o Firefox en aragonés dende Tamién puetz baixar Firefox dreitament en aragonés dende
https://www.mozilla.org/an/

Paquet d'idioma aragonés ta o Mozilla Firefox 9 u superior.
Punche aquí si precisa de paquetz d'idioma ta versions anteriors de
Mozilla Firefox.

Cómo instalar-lo
1. Comprebe que tiene instalada una versión de Firefox superior u igual a la 9.0.
2. Instale o paquet d'idioma aragonés d'ista pachina, u bien dende aquí si tiene una versión anterior.
En Ubuntu tamién puetz fer-lo dende Terminal:
$ sudo apt-get install firefox-locale-an
3. Instale o complemento Locale switcher dende aquí.
4. Reinicie Firefox.
5. En o menú de "Herramientas" u "Tools", cambie l'idioma en a opción "Language" u "Idioma" y trigue "Aragonés". Si no le salise a barra de menús en o cobalto, prete a tecla "Alt" y amaneixerán.
6. Torne a reiniciar quan lo pida o programa, y equiliquá!
7. Si a un caso no funcionase, prebe o siguient: en o navegador, en a barra d'adrezas, meta about:config y marque "Prometo que tendré cuidado" y meta:
general.useragent.locale "an"
intl.locale.matchOS false
8- Torne atra vegada ta o punto 6

Copyright (c) 2011-2013 Juan Pablo Martínez Cortés, Chesús Daniel Trigo Vilaseca, Daniel Martínez Cucalón and Softaragonés.

Licencias (MPL1.1/GPLv3+/LGPLv3+ Tri-licence):
* MPL : Mozilla Public License
version 1.1 -- http://www.mozilla.org/MPL/MPL-1.1.html
* GPL : GNU General Public License
version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html
* LGPL : GNU Lesser General Public License
version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html

Son bienplegaus os informes d'errors y sucherencias sobre a localización. Por favor, ninvie as suyas sucherencias y comentarios ta l'adreza de correu-e softaragones(at)googlegroups(dot)com

Agradeiximientos: Gracias a Toni Hermoso, de Softcatalà por a suya graniza y chenerosa colaboración.

(en)
Aragonese Language Pack for Mozilla Firefox 9 or upper
Click here to find Aragonese language packs for previous versions of Mozilla Firefox. However, It is recommendable to download Mozilla Firefox directly in Aragonese, from https://www.mozilla.org/an/

How to install it
1. Check that you have Firefox intalled (version 9.0 or upper).
2. Install the Aragonese language pack from this page, or from here if you have an older version of Firefox.
In Ubuntu, you can also do it from a Terminal:
$ sudo apt-get install firefox-locale-an
3. Intall the Locale switcher add-on from here.
4. Restart Firefox.
5. In the "Tools" menu, go to "Language" and select "Aragonese". If the menu bar does not appear on the top, press "Alt" key and it will appear.
6. Restart Firefox when the software asks you to do it, and you're done!
7. If it still does not work, do the following: open the browser and write about:config in the address bar, then select "I will take care" and set:
general.useragent.locale "an"
intl.locale.matchOS false
8. Go back to step 6.
Copyright (c) 2011-2012 Juan Pablo Martínez Cortés, Chesús Daniel Trigo Vilaseca, Daniel Martínez Cucalón and Softaragonés.

Licences (MPL1.1/GPLv3+/LGPLv3+ Tri-licence):
* MPL : Mozilla Public License
version 1.1 -- http://www.mozilla.org/MPL/MPL-1.1.html
* GPL : GNU General Public License
version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html
* LGPL : GNU Lesser General Public License
version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html

Any suggestions or feedback about the spelling dictionary are welcome. Please send your suggestions, error reports and/or missing words to softaragones(at)googlegroups(dot)com

Acknowledgements: Thanks to Toni Hermoso, from Softcatalà, for his enourmous and generous support.

addons.name: Ligure (lij) Language Pack
addons.fullDescription:
(ZEN)
Con sto plug-in se peu adeuviâ o Firefox in zeneize!
Firefox in zeneize o l'é scrito inta grafia ofiçiâ

Pe adeuvialo dovei segoî i segoenti passi:

1) Instalâ sto plugin
2) Inta bara di indirissi, scrive about:config e sciacca Invio.
3) Sciacca in sce "accetto i rischi!" pe anâ a-a pagina about:config.
4) Scrivi intl.locale.requested into canpo de riçerca.
5) Sciacca 2 vòtte in sciô intl.locale.requested, se o gh'é, ò azonzilo comme neuva preferensa pöi scrivi lij comme valô.

--Vixita o nòstro scito: http://firefoxzeneize.altervista.org/
( p.s.!!! òua gh'é a verscion conpleta chi: http://www.mozilla.org/lij/firefox/fx/ )
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(ITA)
Con questo plug-in si può usare Firefox in genovese!!
Firefox in zenéize é scritto in grafia ufficiale

Per utilizzarlo dovete seguire i seguenti passi:

1) Installare questo plugin
2) Nella barra degli indirizzi, scrivere about:config e premi Invio.
3) Clicca su "accetto il rischio!" per andare alla pagina about:config.
4) Scrivi intl.locale.requested nel campo di ricerca.
5) Clicca 2 volte su intl.locale.requested, se c'é, o aggiungilo come nuova preferenza poi scrivi lij come valore.

--Visita il nostro sito: http://firefoxzeneize.altervista.org/
( p.s.!!! ora c'é la versione conpleta qui: http://www.mozilla.org/lij/firefox/fx/ )
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(ENG)
Thanks to this plug-in you can use Firefox in Ligurian(genoese)!!
Firefox in zenéize is written with the official orthography

To activate the plugin you must follow this steps:

1) Install this plugin
2) In the address bar, type about:config and press Enter.
3) Click I accept the risk! to continue to the about:config page.
4) Type intl.locale.requested in the Search field.
5) Double-click the intl.locale.requested preference, if found, or add it as a new preference and write lij

--Visit our website: http://firefoxzeneize.altervista.org/
( p.s.!!! now there is the complete version here: http://www.mozilla.org/lij/firefox/fx/ )
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
